47. $y=|x-2|+|x+1|=\left[\begin{array}{l}x-2+x+1=2x-1,\ x>2,\\ 2-x+x+1=3,\ x\in[-1;2],\\ -x+2-x-1=-2x+1,\ x<-1.\end{array}\right.$
